text: Vallouise-Pelvoux is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Pelvoux (the seat) and Vallouise.Arrêté préfectoral 5 September 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Vallouise-Pelvoux
